name: Blip Rider
description:
A 2 player desert racer where you mow down you foe with your mini gun. Developed for Make-A-Thing game jam within 4 days. Inspired by the theme words blip, kind and Thwart.

Xbox 360 Controllers required

WebGL

  • Right Button - Accelerate
  • Left Button - Reverse
  • X - Shoot
  • A - Stop

PC

  • Right Trigger - Accelerate
  • Left Trigger - Reverse
  • X - Shoot
  • A - Stop
